roleset.name: open, opening again
roleset.note: REOPEN-V NOTES: Member of Vncls other_cos-45.4. Updated by Julia, 10/2010. (from reopen.01-v)

example.name: basic transitive
example.text: In a surprise announcement, the Treasury said it will reopen the outstanding benchmark 30-year bond rather than create a new one for next week's quarterly refunding of the federal debt.

example.name: with instrument
example.text: By Wednesday, frustrated Belgian brokers reopened the market by using the time-honored method of quoting stocks with chalk on a blackboard.
example.arg: by using the time-honored method of quoting stocks with chalk on a blackboard

example.name: ergative
example.text: The new institution is also called Century Bank, and the failed bank's five offices will reopen today.

example.name: topicalized instrument
example.text: This can opener reopens bottles, too!

example.name: benefactive
example.text: South Korea has reopened its market to foreign cigarettes.
